availability.leadItems: Lead Times: 2 to 3 weeks (Indicative for 50 Units)

features: Pallet Boxes - affordable boxes for shipping and storage for larger consignments
Cardboard pallet boxes are heavy duty boxes and have excellent vertical strength
If your packing requires burst strength - please call to discuss your needs with Visy Boxes and More
benefits: More Sustainable - Up to 20% lighter weight with 39% reduced carbon footprint*
Robust Barrier - Thansparent film option with high barrier protection keeping or extending shelf-life
Product Appeal - Brighter colours and optional windows
Robust Barrier - High barrier for full aroma and flavour

sustainability.pcr: PCR is plastic that has been used by consumers before, e.g. as rigid plastic bottles, then recycled and used to produce flexible films. We can offer flexible packaging with a percentage of PCR content
